short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the hexadecimal code of a color.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a pixel on the screen and collect the hexadecimal color code. In just a few clicks, you will be able to obtain the code for any color that is present on your screen and use it in any other program that interests you.
